name: Worry Eaters: Dada Land
summary: Are you the one they have been waiting for? Do you have the skill to master 80 challenging levels by guiding your favorite Worry Eaters through, over and under any obstacle that may lie ahead of them? Each Worry Eater has their own special ability, that allows them to overcome anything. Travel through colorful fantasy worlds in this “I can’t stop playing” jump 'n’ run!
